p: We implemented a microclimate model (Mitchell, Beckman, Bailey, & Porter, 1975; Porter & James, 1979; Porter, Mitchell, Beckman, & DeWitt, 1973) using finite‐difference methods to solve heat balance equations describing soil temperatures at the surface and specified depths (Kingsolver, 1979; Kingsolver & Buckley, 2015). We scaled microclimate variables to plant height by estimating temperature and windspeed profiles (Campbell & Norman, 1998) using data collected at heights spanning 0.05–1.5 m in July 2012 at the subalpine site. Based on weather station data from July 2011 at this site, the mean wind speed at 0.5 m height was 0.4 m/s.
